segments.text: I see the light streaming through the window, illuminating the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her dish that she doesn’t notice the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water flows freely, creating an ever-widening lake at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How strange to be so unaware of the chaos brewing beneath you.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so determined, stretching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how brave he is, yet how foolish, and my heart races.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting, her hand reaching up, anticipation clear in her posture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel the tension; it’s almost electric.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout a warning, to pull them back from the edge of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But instead, I find myself frozen, watching this moment unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
